description: Mock Jira data for sample use cases: issue resolution and comment management. 103 issues total.

issues.summary: Login page returns 500 when SSO is enabled
issues.description: When SSO is enabled and a user clicks Login, the server returns HTTP 500. Stack trace points to AuthService.validateSamlResponse().

issues.summary: Dashboard export to CSV includes PII columns
issues.description: Export to CSV includes columns that contain PII (email, name). These should be redacted or excluded by default for compliance.

issues.summary: API rate limit not applied for internal service accounts
issues.description: Internal service accounts bypass rate limiting. Need to apply a higher but still bounded limit (e.g. 10k req/min) for audit and fairness.
